Name: Monster Legend
About the game: 'Monster Legend' is a 3D game with roguelike, self-propelled chess and strategy. You can upgrade various fantasy creatures and form different team lineups. These creatures have their own unique skills. You can also expand the monster mod to realize your fantastic ideas, and let all kinds of magical and interesting monsters and equipment join the game. In the game, you will meet all kinds of strange creatures and form different teams. Each creature has its own unique skills. If you are a self-propelled chess enthusiast, then this book will not let you down.
